keep in mind, Higher-speed ram tends to have slower timings. when you underclock it, the timings are still going to be slower
meaning you will have higher-latency overall on your ram, decreasing performance
however, unless you are doing things the require a lot of memory operations, the difference shouldn't be a big deal
